title: Intermediate German for Science Fields Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic German grammar and daily conversation skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learner-centered design, emphasizing practical German language use in scientific fields.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately use 150 core scientific vocabulary and expressions contextually.
Learners can extract key content from three types of professional documents, including lab and research reports.
Learners achieve over 70% listening comprehension in German in academic presentation contexts.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
